previous.excerpt: Get safer and more effective workouts at home with 1:1 voice feedback to improve your posture and encouragement to push you further. Counts reps as you do them ⏱️ Instant suggestions on improving posture 🗨️ Cheers you throughout your training session 🗣️

localize.description: 通过1：1语音反馈改善您的姿势，并鼓励您进一步推动，在家中获得更安全、更有效的锻炼。在您做代表时计算他们的数量⏱️关于改进姿势的即时建议🗨️在整个培训课程中为您干杯🗣️
